title-group.article-title: Retraction Note: MicroRNA-143 targets MAPK3 to regulate the proliferation and bone metastasis of human breast cancer cells

custom-meta.meta-value: © Springer-Verlag GmbH Germany, part of Springer Nature 2024

body.p: Retraction Note to: Du et al. AMB Expr (2020) 10:134 10.1186/s13568-020-01072-w

Editor-in-Chief has retracted this article at the request of the corresponding author. Following publication, concerns were raised about similarities between the published figures and those in previously published articles. Specifically:

list-item.p: Figure 2C appears to have partial overlap with Figure 2 in (Yu et al. 2018);
Figure 2D appears to have partial overlap with Figure 1E in (Chen et al. 2019) and Figure 4 in (Li et al. 2018);
Figures 3A, B appear to have partial overlap with Figure 3D in (Qiu et al. 2018); and
Figures 3C, D appear to have partial overlap with Figure 4 in (Ningning et al. 2019) when flipped.

body.p: The corresponding author has stated that the affected figures were obtained through a commercial lab hired to perform some of the experiments for this study.
The Editor-in-Chief therefore no longer has confidence in the integrity of the data in this article.

Yiqun Du and Zhiqiang Wu agree with this retraction, but not the wording of this retraction notice. None of the other authors have responded to any correspondence from the editor or publisher about this retraction.

fn.p: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
